name: Wingsuit Flying
overview: Glide through the air in a specialized suit.

name: Wakeboarding
overview: Riding a board while being towed behind a motorboat

name: Snowboarding
overview: Descending a snow-covered slope while standing on a single board

name: Skydiving
overview: Jumping from an aircraft with a parachute

name: Paragliding
overview: Gliding through the air using a parachute-like canopy

name: MTB
overview: Riding bicycles off-road, tackling trails and rough terrain

name: Drifting
overview: driving technique where the driver intentionally oversteers

name: Climbing
overview: Ascending rock faces or indoor climbing walls.

name: Canoeing
overview: Propelling a canoe through water using paddles

name: High Diving
overview: Diving from significant heights into water

name: Ice Climbing
overview: Climbing ice formations such as frozen waterfalls or ice-covered rock

name: Volcano Boarding
overview: Riding down the slopes of a volcano on a board

name: Highlining
overview: Crossing a rope or line stretched between mountains or high points

name: Mountaineering
overview: Exploring and climbing mountains with specialized equipment

name: Whitewater Rafting
overview: Dive into heart-pounding action as you navigate fierce rapids and tackle wild waters with your team.
